channel.title: neuromorphic on Open Neuromorphic
channel.description: Recent content in neuromorphic on Open Neuromorphic

item.title: Digital neuromophic hardware read list
item.description: Here’s a list of articles and theses related to digital hardware designs for neuomorphic applications. I plan to update it regularly. To be redirected directly to the sources, click on the titles! If you are new to neuromorphic computing, I strongly suggest to get a grasp of how an SNN works from this paper. Otherwise, it will be pretty difficult to understand the content of the papers listed here. 2015 TrueNorth: Design and Tool Flow of a 65 mW 1 Million Neuron Programmable Neurosynaptic Chip, Filipp Akopyan et al.
